name: knowtes
description:
We want to make it easier for everyone to get sheet music, without having to transcribe it themselves.
_Especially_ if they dont have the skillset to do so, making music as a whole more accessible.

scripts.reload: npm run build-react && npm run dev
scripts.watch: nodemon --exec "cd app && npm run build && cd .. && nodemon index.js" -e js,ts,tsx,css --ignore app/build/ --watch app/src
